name: Pumpkaboo
description: The Pumpkin Pokémon. The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If an opponent uses a consumable held item in battle, this Pokémon gains a copy of it if it is not currently holding an item.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sleep.

specialAbilityText: Pumpkaboo come in a variety of sizes: Small, Average, Large, and Supersize (All considered "Small" for D&D). The stat block above is for its Small variety. For each size above Small, decrease its DEX by -1 and raise its CON by +1.
